mapper.insert: insert into swork (sw_file_name, sw_file_path, sw_correctTime) values (#{sw_file_name}, #{sw_file_path}, now())
mapper.select: select swork.sw_sid, swork.sw_sid, swork.sw_id, student.s_number, swork.sw_wid, swork.sw_file_name, swork.sw_file_path, swork.sw_grade, swork.sw_remark, swork.sw_correctTime, swork.sw_addTime, twork.tw_name as sw_name from swork left join twork on twork.tw_id = swork.sw_wid left join student on student.s_id = swork.sw_sid where twork.tw_tid = #{teacherId}
